definition: A state or quality characterized by a low temperature, often used to describe the absence or lack of warmth. It is commonly used to refer to the physical sensation or condition of being cold, as well as the atmospheric condition of low temperature.

examples.german: Die Kälte kriecht langsam in meine Knochen.
examples.english: The cold slowly creeps into my bones.

examples.german: Die Kälte des Winters ist wunderschön.
examples.english: The cold of winter is beautiful.
